column2: how have i never wrote a review of this place?! I will make this and sweet that way you can read it quick and call them to reserve a table. I'm not from Chicago but it's my favorite restaurant of all time. There is not one bad thing on the menu. The braised short rib-HOLY CRAP. The sangria-DELICIOUS. The bacon wrapped dates-WONDERFUL. The service is always top notch and if anything is wrong they make it right. To be fair
column3: the food has never ever been bad
column4: it's just the wait sometimes but it's SO worth it.
